name: Deadly Dunes
description:
Created for Mini Jam 53 - Oasis

Controls:
 - A - Move Left
 - D - Move Right
 - W / Space - Jump
 - Arrow Keys - Attack in each direction
 - E - Ready / UnReady Bomb, attack to throw
 - Left mouse - Cast / Retract fishing line

Goal:
Get as far through the desert as you can, slaying desert critters along the way and catching fish to restore your strength.

How to play:
In each oasis room, you can use your fishing rod to catch fish, throw the line out and try and get the float near a fish to catch it. Once you get a bite, you will pull the fish out the water, but watch out, these fish wont get caught without a fight! Use your attack to slice the fish before it bites you!

In each fight room, you need to defeat all the enemies, once you do, a portal will spawn to take you to the next room. Be sure to fight fast though, as the intense desert heat will quickly drain your health while away from the safety of the oasis! 

After clearing a number of fight rooms, you will reach another oasis room to restock on fish. If you left any fish alive in the previous oasis, you will receive bombs as a reward. 

Anytime you would die, if you have any fish, you will eat a fish to return to max health. Once you're out of fish, you will die for good, and will have to begin from the start.
